@i0wnuall wrote:

ok
well i have Phonescape
but i was adding words to the npcs…:if (npcs[i].npcType == 550) { // Lowe Verrock archery shopkeeper
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Range equipment here!”;
}
}
that is the one that existed before i came along…so i edited wat it said.
than my friend told me how to make words that were not there before i was there …so i got the first one but than i did what he told me…he told me to duplictae one than just changes it arround like this:
if (npcs[i].npcType == 2167) { // customer
if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Potions and bones here!”;

so than i restrated compiled than pressed runserver.bat like he told me to do and i came on and the customer dident say anything u can come on my server to have a look but plz help me in any way possible!
